00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 // Data Structure for this object
00013 typedef struct _jcom_metro{
00014         t_pxobject      obj;
00015         void            *obex;
00016         void            *outlet;
00017         double          attr_period;
00018         long            attr_active;
00019         t_object        *event;
00020 } t_jcom_metro;
00021 
00022 // Prototypes for methods
00023 void*           jcom_metro_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00024 void            jcom_metro_free(t_jcom_metro *x);
00025 void            jcom_metro_int(t_jcom_metro *x, long toggle);
00026 void            jcom_metro_tick(t_jcom_metro *x);
00027 t_max_err       metro_attr_setperiod(t_jcom_metro *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00028 
00029 // Globals
00030 static t_class* jcom_metro_class;
00031 
00032 
00033 /************************************************************************************/
00034 // Main() Function
00035 
00036 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00037 {
00038         t_class *c;
00039         
00040         jamoma_init();
00041 
00042         // Define our class
00043         c = class_new("jcom.metro", (method)jcom_metro_new, (method)jcom_metro_free, 
00044                 sizeof(t_jcom_metro), (method)NULL, A_GIMME, 0);
00045 
00046         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_jcom_metro, obex));
00047 
00048         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00049         class_addmethod(c, (method)jcom_metro_int,                      "int",          A_FLOAT,        0);
00050         class_addmethod(c, (method)jamoma_dsp,                          "dsp",          A_CANT,         0L);
00051         class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,         "dumpout",      A_CANT,         0);
00052 
00053         // Add attributes to our class:
00054         class_addattr(c, 
00055                 attr_offset_new("interval", _sym_float64, 0,
00056                 (method)0, (method)metro_attr_setperiod, calcoffset(t_jcom_metro, attr_period))
00057         );      
00058         
00059         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00060         class_dspinit(c);
00061 
00062         // Finalize our class
00063         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00064         jcom_metro_class = c;
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 /************************************************************************************/
00070 // Object Life
00071 
00072 // Create
00073 void *jcom_metro_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00074 {
00075         t_jcom_metro    *x = (t_jcom_metro*)object_alloc(jcom_metro_class);
00076         long                    attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);
00077 
00078         if(x){
00079                 object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (t_object*)outlet_new(x, NULL));
00080                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, 1);                  // Create Object and Inlets
00081                 x->outlet = outlet_new(x, 0L);
00082                 x->event = NULL;
00083 
00084                 if(attrstart && argv)
00085                         x->attr_period = atom_getlong(argv);
00086                 else
00087                         x->attr_period = 1000.0;
00088                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);               
00089         }
00090         return x;
00091 }
00092 
00093 // Destroy
00094 void jcom_metro_free(t_jcom_metro *x)
00095 {       
00096         if(x->event)
00097                 jamoma_scheduler_removeevent(NULL, x->event);
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 /************************************************************************************/
00102 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00103 
00104 void jcom_metro_int(t_jcom_metro *x, long toggle)
00105 {
00106         if(toggle && (x->attr_active != toggle))
00107                 x->event = jamoma_scheduler_delay((t_object*)x, NULL, (method)jcom_metro_tick, &x->attr_period, true, JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_MEDIUM);
00108         else if(!toggle && (x->attr_active != toggle)){
00109                 jamoma_scheduler_removeevent(NULL, x->event);
00110                 x->event = NULL;
00111         }
00112 
00113         x->attr_active = toggle;
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 void jcom_metro_tick(t_jcom_metro *x)
00118 {
00119         outlet_bang(x->outlet);
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 t_max_err metro_attr_setperiod(t_jcom_metro *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00124 {
00125         x->attr_period = atom_getfloat(argv);
00126         
00127         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00128 }
